author: Simon Difford
description: Yellow Chartreuse replaces triple sec in this riff on the classic Corpse Reviver Cocktail No.2.
name: Corpse Reviver No.2 (Contemporary Recipe)
recipeIngredient: 22.5 ml Lillet Blanc (or other aromatized wine)
10 ml Chilled water (omit if wet ice)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
